#summary Examples of the Fibonnaci function.
#labels Code-example

= Fibonacci =

Here is the Fibonnaci function in Python:

{{{
def fib(n):
  if n <= 1:
    return n
  else:
    return fib(n-1) + fib(n-2)
}}}

Here is the same function in Cat:

{{{
define fib(n) { n 1 <= [n] [n 1 - fib n 2 - fib +] if }
}}}
